Text: Thank God! I've been looking for this since the movie came out!  The fact that X was in the soundtrack is the only reason I went to see the movie.

OMG I am so happy they got back together, and they might tour outside Japan!
RIP Hide!

Well, this song is nice, but the lyrics are crap! I'm so sick of these decayed junkies and their shitty stories about needles and intra-vein injections. Fuck them all! 
To bad for the song, though. It is really catchy. It is like working hard to make a beautiful cake and than take a shit on top of it, and ruin everything...
Thanks ! I'll be seeding for some days. =)
